bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Fireplace
bianco-collection.Body:
Elegant and simple fireplace design makes full use of alternating glossy white glass and high polish silver mirror to create a gleaming face that will lighten and brighten the room.
Clean lines makes it easy to dress up or keep dressed down for a minimal look.
Sturdy and heavy, made of high quality materials. Part of our stunning Bianco collection

Dimensions: 124 x 41 x 105 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Table Lamp
bianco-collection.Body:
Bianco Table Lamp has cool and comptemporary style with simple clean design that fits into any room. Features white glass and plain mirror. Perfect accompaniment to Bianco Floor Lamp.

Table Lamp - 25 x 15 x 44cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Dressing Table Set
bianco-collection.Body:
Stunning Bianco Dressing Table Set 
  • White In Colour
  • Mirrored 3 Small Drawers on each side
  • 1 Large Drawer in the middle
  • Crystal handles
Set includes:
  • Dressing Table
  • Stool
  • Folding Mirror
  • Modern Italian Design
Comes Pre-Assembled
Dimensions:
  • Mirror: 60 x 90 x 1.7 cm
  • Table: 120 x 45 x 80 cm
  • Seat: 38 x 38 x 45 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Three Drawer Bedside Unit
bianco-collection.Body:
Create the Hollywood glamour look with the Bianco bedroom, boudoir collection. This three drawer bedside unit gives great storage with a super sleek look.

  • Mirrored edge finish
  • Crystal glamour handles
  • Wipe clean surface tops, glass finish

Dimensions - 50 x 40 x 69.5 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Console Table & Mirror Set
bianco-collection.Body:
Special Offer 

Stunning Bianco Mirror & Console Table Set 

Size:

  • Mirror - 80 x 120cm 
  • Console - 140 x 35 x 75cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Grand Fireplace
bianco-collection.Body:
Elegant and simple fireplace design makes full use of alternating glossy white glass and high polish silver mirror to create a gleaming face that will lighten and brighten the room.
Clean lines makes it easy to dress up or keep dressed down for a minimal look.
Sturdy and heavy, made of high quality materials.

Dimensions: 144 x 48 x 110 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Floor Lamp
bianco-collection.Body:
Bianco Floor Lamp stylish addition for any fashion forward room with clean simple, comptemporary design. Features white glass and plain mirror. Well balanced and strong design for duribility. Perfect accompaniment to Bianco Table Lamp.

Floor Lamp - 35 x 20 x 125cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Large Pedestal
bianco-collection.Body:
Give your home more of a luxurious style with our new stunning bianco range and this beautiful large pedestal. Coming with glossy white glass and high polish silver mirror detailing, this beautiful piece is sure to impress.

Colour: White Glass/Mirror

Size: Large - 40 x 40 x 80 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Fan Console Table
bianco-collection.Body:
Our Bianco Fan console table will catch the eyes of all guests as they walk into your home. The white and glass triangular design of the base is a statement piece, and it is perfect for ornaments, plants, photographs and more. This has just been added to our new bianco collection range

Colour: White glass/plain mirror

Size: 80 x 45 x 80 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco Nest Of Tables
bianco-collection.Body:
Stylish and sleek, the nest of tables has a simple and clean design , stunning as a trio but equally charming when used separately. Sides are glossy white glass with high polish silver mirror detailing on the face, top is also white glass and features silver mirror double strip. It's minimal design will lend it to suit any room.
Sturdy and heavy, made of high quality materials.

Dimensions: 60 x 40 x 50 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Coffee Table
bianco-collection.Body:
Stylish and sleek, this coffee table has a simple and clean design that makes it easy to match to your present and future decor! High polish silver legs, glossy white glass top that features silver mirror double strip. It's minimal design will lift the room.
Sturdy, made of high quality materials.

Dimensions: 100 x 50 x 50 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Corner TV Unit
bianco-collection.Body:
Stylish and sleek TV Unit differs slightly from it's sibling, this version is six sided would best suited for corners or bay windows and alcoves. Features a shelf and two drawers for storage. Sides and drawers are glossy white glass with high polish silver mirror detailing on the face,  top is also white glass and features silver mirror double strip. It's minimal design will lend it to suit any room.
Sturdy and heavy, made of high quality materials.

Dimensions: 102  x 51 x 60 cm

bianco-collection.Name: Bianco TV Unit
bianco-collection.Body:
Stylish and sleek rectangle TV Unit. Features a small shelf,single drawer and two small cupboards for storage. Crystal effect handles on doors. Sides, doors and drawer are glossy white glass with high polish silver mirror detailing on the face,  top is also white glass and features silver mirror double strip. It's minimal design will lend it to suit any room.
Sturdy and heavy, made of high quality materials.

Dimensions: 136 x 50 x 56 cm

tables-chairs.Name: Taiwan Cross Legged Dining Chair
tables-chairs.Body:
The Taiwan Cross Legged Dining Chair range is the ideal choice for a large-scale luxury style. This beautiful range features a deep buttoned back on a smooth velvet finish. Gold Cross Legs complete this range. 

What you need to know about our Taiwan Dining Chairs:

• Dimensions: 59cm (W) x 74cm (D) x 100cm (H)

• Premium High-Quality Material - UK Fire Resistant Tested

• Deep buttoned upholstered back

• Soft velvet finish

• High Quality Gold X Crossed Legs

tables-chairs.Name: Taiwan Cross Legged Dining Chair
tables-chairs.Body:

tables-chairs.Name: Grey Bentley Chair With Gold Legs
tables-chairs.Body:
Bentley collection is sure to make a bold statement with its stunning lion knocker back design and Gold polished steel legs.
The padded seating and comfortable curved back rest is wrapped in a luxurious soft luxury velvet fabric with a Buttoned design
The beautifully designed chair can be used in any interior setting, dining, living or bedroom.
These are beautiful dining chairs which will look great with any dining table, or they can be placed in the bedroom, living room or hallway, These chairs are very well padded for extra support and are built to last.

Size:
  • W:56cm x D:64cm x Heigth: 100cm

sofas.Name: Milford Corner Sofa Iron Velvet
sofas.Body:
Stretch out and relax on the Milford Corner sofa and matching footstool. Bang on trend, the urban chic design and tactile velvet fabric make the Milford a contemporary addition to a modern home.

The deep set button detailing and sophisticated black metal legs are the epitome of luxury.

Crafted using the highest quality controls and made from soft iron velvet fabric, a solid wood frame and firm yet comfortable spring cushions, the Milford is as comfortable as it is attractive.

280cm L x 215cm L (includes footstool) x 80cm Height x 90cm Depth

sofas.Name: Lucy Sofa Grey Velvet
sofas.Body:
Designed with elegance, simplicity and practicality in mind, the Lucy sofa bed and it’s sleek design and extra storage superbly makes the most of any space.

Centred around comfort and an ability to open into a sofa bed within seconds, the Lucy is an ideal choice for a compact home or apartment. Lift the chaise to reveal additional storage space,  a great spot for storing your extra bedding.
